text: magar (ho) jin logon ne (nifaaq se) tauba kar lee aur apanee haalat duroost kar lee aur khuda se lage lipate rahe aur apane deen ko mahaz khuda ke vaaste nira khara kar liya to ye log momineen ke saath (behisht mein) honge aur momineen ko khuda anaqareeb hee bada (achchha) badala ata faramaega
